description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Mrs. Geo. T. Marye [between ca. 1910 and ca. 1915] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Photograph shows wife of banker George Thomas Marye, Jr. (1849-1933) who served as Ambassador to Russia from 1914 to 1916. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2011) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.19933 Call Number: LC-B2- 3604-6
